description: Try our easy to follow Vegetable, Rice & Parmesan Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Tomato,Sesame free,Spinach,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Vegetable, Rice & Parmesan Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 sheet frozen butter puff pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Soak rice in cold water to cover for 20 minutes. Drain well and combine in a large bowl with tomatoes, spinach, cabbage and eggs. Reserve 1 tablespoon of parmesan for the top and stir remainder into rice mixture.
Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook mushrooms, in 2 batches for 4-5 minutes or until golden brown. Transfer to bowl with rice.
Using 1 1/2 sheets of the pastry, line base and sides of a 25x16x3cm deep (base measurement) slab pan, overlapping sheets and pressing firmly to join. Spoon mixture into pan.
Join remaining pastry and place over filling. Press pastry edges together to seal. Brush with extra egg and sprinkle with salt, pepper and reserved parmesan.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until pastry is golden and cooked through.
